title: INU Mulungu
author: Unknown
verses: Mpingo Woyera! wa kwa anthu onse;

title: TSOPANO
author: Unknown
verses: Ndi Yesu Mbuyathu, Ndi Mzimu Wakuyera;

title: NDITAMATU
author: Unknown
verses: Akazi amasiye, maka ndi ana'wo onsewo;

title: MULUNGU ndiye Mbusa wanga
author: Unknown
verses: Za mdima, imfa, nkhondo ndi zoipa sindiopa;

title: TITAME Mlungu Wakumwamba
author: Unknown
chorus: Kukoma kwake kwatipatsa Zonse tili nazo

title: NDIKULEMEKEZA
author: Unknown
verses: Onse adzandiyesa ine wodala nsiku zonse.
Dzina la Ambuyanga lili loyera kopambana.
Ndiye amachitira chifundo anthu a mibadwo,
E! a mibadwo yonse yakumuopa ndi kummvera.
Iye amazichita zamphamvu nawo mkono wake;
Iye natsitsa kunsi mafumu ku mipando yawo.
Iye nakweza konko omwe afatsa nasauka.
Ife amakhutitsa anjala ndi zabwino zake,
Ndi olemera onse naŵaingits’ opanda kanthu.
Monga anapangana ponena kwa makolo athu,
Ali kuthandizadi lero anake a Yakobo,
Inde chifundo chokha akuchitira ana ake.

title: AMBUYE ngwodalitsika
author: Unknown
verses: Napulumutsa tonse mwapfuko la Davide mwana wake;
Ndipo adzachitira akulu chifundo ndi chisoni.
Ndiye akumbukira pangani loyera lake lija,
Ndi chilumbiro chake cha kwa atate Abrahamu,
Ndi kuyeranso mtima mwa chilungamo nsiku zonse.
Ndiwe udzakonzera njira ya Mbuye Wakumwamba.
Udzadziŵitsa anthu za Mpulumutsi wawo yemwe
Poti Mulungu wathu ali ndi mtima wachifundo.
Poŵalitsira omwe ali mumdima ndi muimfa,

title: AMITHENGA a Mulungu
author: Unknown
verses: Wabadwa usiku uno Yesu Kristu Ambuyathu
Anthu onse ali pansi Adza akondane naye.

title: AMBUYE Tsopano Lino
author: Unknown
verses: AMBUYE tsopano lino, monga mwa mawu anu aja,
Ndi nyali yakuŵalitsa omwe sadziŵa mawu anu;

title: ALELUYA
author: Unknown
verses: Mphamvu za imfa ndi za Satana

title: LAMBIRA, Mfumuyo
author: Unknown
verses: Nyenyezi, dziko, dzuŵa, mwezi ndi mitamboyi;

title: DZIKO LINO LAPANSI
author: Unknown
verses: Dziko lino lapansi mavuto ndi osatha,
Moyo uno wam'dziko abale ndi wozunza,

title: Yamikani Dzina
author: Unknown
verses: Iye ndiye Mfumu ya mafumu onse,
Iye ndiye Mfumu ya mafumu onse,
chorus: Iye ndiye Mfumu ya mafumu onse,

title: Mzimu Woyera
author: Unknown
verses: Tikhale tonse nazo mphamvu zanu zonsezo.

title: Mpume Pa Inetu
author: Unknown
verses: MPUME pa inetu, Mpweya wa Mulungu,
Mpume pa inetu, Mpweya wa Mulungu,
Mpume pa inetu, Mpweya wa Mulungu,
Mpume pa inetu, Mpweya wa Mulungu,

title: SANGALATSA akusowa
author: Unknown
verses: Dziko ili ndi lochimwa, lodzaza ndi chisoni,
chorus: Tonse tichitetu bwino, masiku ali kutha.

title: AMENE adzavomereza ndithu
author: Unknown
verses: Dzina la Yesu pamaso pa anthu;

title: A! MBUSA wathu
author: Unknown
chorus: Bwezatu, bwezatu Bweza zakezo kwa Yesu.

title: AITANA, aitana dziko lonse
author: Unknown
verses: Mfumu iyi, Mfumu iyi ya Kumwamba
Ndi Yesu, ndi Mpulumutsiyo wa anthu onse.
Anthu onse, anthu onse, tinke kwawo.
Ndi Yesu, amene anakhetsa mwazi wake;
Ndi Yesu amene anakhetsa mwazi wake;
Titi bwanji? Titi bwanji ife anthu?

title: LEKANI kubvutika ndi zinthu za padziko
author: Unknown
verses: LEKANI kubvutika ndi zinthu za padziko,
